Town Hall (Polls)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Town Hall (Polls)
Polls are restricted to the Town Hall Section.

Unlike other message boards, where "What's Your Favorite Monster?"
or "What's The Best Monster?" is being posted over and over again,
let's try to be a bit more creative!

  • Monster Rancher 2 Polls March 17 - 12:05 pm

  • Monster Rancher 3 Polls January 15 - 07:13 am
